column5: New secure gated community, ideal for business travelers. Easy in and easy out, completely BUSINESS READY home with all the amenities.  Conveniently located. Take the DFW Airport south exit and just west of the south entrance is where you will be staying. It's as close and convenient as we could possibly make it. Everything business travelers like you and me could want or need to make their trip easy, convenient and successful.
column8: Upscale BUSINESS READY apt next to DFW Airport
